entry.title: Beauty Synergy (60 tablets) - Tissue Salt Blend for Skin, Hair & Nails
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 92.50

AllisOne's Beauty Synergy (60 tablets) is a carefully formulated blend of tissue salts to rejuvenate ageing skin, counteract skin blemishes, dryness, itchiness or oiliness AND strengthen hair and nails.
  • Enhances skin, hair & nails of all ages and conditions
  • Reduces wrinkles and firms mature skin
  • Supports elastic tissues, collagen and the connective tissues
  • Helps to restore balance and counteract skin blemishes, dryness, itchiness or oiliness
  • Use as a regular skin tonic
  • Economical one tablet dose to combat skin, hair and nail conditions
  • Lactose and sugar free (Vegan and diabetic friendly), suitable for animals, diabetics and children

Ingredients

Beauty Synergy contains the equivalent of six individual tissue salts: Kali Mur D6, Calc Fluor D6, Kali Sulph D6, Nat Phos D6, Silicea D6, Nat Mur D6

Directions for use

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively, as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage. Use for a period of time in order to achieve results.

  • Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
  • Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or a bottle) 
  • Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside.
  • Teenage or Adult Acne: Use Beauty Synergy together with Calc Sulph or Pure Synergy

    Disclaimer: This product has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.
entry.s:tag: AllisOne Wholesale Distrubutor in South Africa

  • Supports strong bones and joints

  • Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside

  • Promotes musculo-skeletal and joint health, suppleness and flexibility
  • Improves circulation

entry.title: Triple Complex Diabetonic - Tissue salts for natural blood sugar balance
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 121.50

Triple Complex Diabetonic combines bio-chemic tissue salts chosen to support pancreatic health and insulin balance. It can benefit all people, but is especially good for diabetics or those who are pre-diabetic. This remedy is safe to use along with prescription meds (including insulin) as well as natural medicines. 

  • Great supplement for anyone with Diabetes
  • Pancreatic tonic
  • Promotes healthy blood sugar & insulin levels
  • Helps reduce the craving for sweet foods
  • Safe for all ages and during pregnancy or breastfeeding

Ingredients

Triple Complex Diabetonic contains the following selected biochemic tissue salts:

Kali sulph (D6), Nat sulph (D6), Calc phos (D6), Lactose (inactive ingredient)

    Directions

    Triple Complex Diabetonic can be used as a daily supplement in its own right, or as an adjunct to enhance the benefits of natural medicines for various conditions. It comes in small sucking tablets which are placed under the tongue to dissolve.

    Dosage:

    6 years and older: As a regular supplement, dissolve 2 tablets under the tongue or chew in the mouth three times daily. The frequency of dosage can be increased to five or six times daily when needed.

    Age 1 - 6 years: One tablet three times daily (may be crushed into a powder and sprinkled in the mouth)  

    Note: Because tissue salts improve cellular functioning and assist with absorption, they are frequently recommended as companion remedies to other natural medicines.

      Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

AllisOne's Ferrum Phos (60 tablets) is also known as the biochemic first-aid salt. Ferrum Phos is responsible for our ability and capacity to obtain Oxygen from the outside.

  • As an oxygen carrier and biochemic anti-inflammatory, it supports the immune system and facilitates the release of energy
  • Maintains muscular functional strength and is therefore supportive to athletes and healthy active children

entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 92.50

AllisOne's Rescue Synergy (60 tablets) is carefully formulated to bring you stability and composure and to help ease stress. 

  • Economical one tablet dose to assist in managing everyday stressful situations 
  • Helps to centre your energy, ease emotional upsets, edginess, irritability, moodiness, restlessness, sleeplessness, tearfulness, tension, fatigue, fear and mild anxiety.*
  • A useful tonic during pregnancy for mother and baby
  • Beneficial for hyperactive or exhausted children, students and adults having to cope with a lot of mental and physical demands
  • Lactose and sugar free (Vegan and diabetic friendly), suitable for animals, diabetics and children

*Consult your practitioner if symptoms persist after 3-4 weeks.

Ingredients

Rescue Synergy contains the equivalent of 7 individual tissue salts: Kali Phos D6, Kali Mur D6, Mag Phos D6, Nat Phos D6, Silicea D6, Calc Phos D6 and Nat Mur D6.

Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day

Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside.

entry.title: Triple Complex NicoTonic - Stay calm during nicotine withdrawal
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 121.50

Triple Complex NicoTonic combines bio-chemic tissue salts chosen to support the nervous system. It is especially beneficial for people who are trying to give up smoking as it helps to soothe the nerves and reduce the restlessness and irritability associated with nicotine withdrawal. 

  • Helps you stop smoking and reduces the 'short fuse' syndrome (frequently associated with nicotine withdrawal)
  • Promotes the bio-availability of nutrients, hormones and bio-chemicals that are usually depleted by the stress of nicotine and drug withdrawal
  • Helps to prevent headaches, irritability, temper outbursts and restlessness
  • Ensures a calmer and more successful path to a cigarette free life!
  • Safe for use by all ages, including during pregnancy
  • Formulated by a Clinical Psychologist

Ingredients

Triple Complex NicoTonic contains the following selected biochemic tissue salts:

Nat phos (D6), Kali phos (D6), Nat mur (D6), Lactose (inactive ingredient)

    Directions

    Triple Complex NicoTonic comes in small sucking tablets which are placed under the tongue to dissolve.

    Dosage:
    First few weeks of stopping smoking: Use as a daily supplement. Dissolve 2 tablets under the tongue or chew in the mouth three times daily. During times of stress or when withdrawal symptoms are acute, the frequency of dosage can be increased to up to every 30 minutes.

    After the first few weeks: Use first thing in the morning and then as needed throughout the day

    Note: Because tissue salts improve cellular functioning and assist with absorption, they are frequently recommended as companion remedies to other natural medicines, such as Feelgood Health MindSoothe and Crave-Rx.

      Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.
entry.s:tag: Natural remedy to help nicotine withdrawal

  • Natural tonic for the respiratory system
  • Opens up bronchioles 
  • Reduces acute bronchospasm
  • Restores easy breathing & reduce stress linked to asthma attack
  • Prevents asthma attacks caused by cold air and allergic reactions
  • Safe for all ages and during pregnancy

Ingredients

Triple Complex BronchoSoothe contains the following selected biochemic tissue salts:

Kali Phos (D6), Mag Phos (D6), Nat Sulph (D6), Lactose (inactive ingredient)

    Directions

    Triple Complex BronchoSoothe can be used as a daily supplement in its own right, or as an adjunct to enhance the benefits of natural medicines for various conditions. It comes in small sucking tablets which are placed under the tongue to dissolve.

    Dosage:

    6 years and older: As a regular supplement, dissolve 2 - 4 tablets under the tongue or chew in the mouth three times daily. During times of respiratory distress, the frequency of dosage can be increased to every 10 minutes if necessary.

    Age 1 - 6 years: One tablet three times daily (may be crushed into a powder and sprinkled in the mouth). Frequency of dosage may be increased as above. 

    Note: Because tissue salts improve cellular functioning and assist with absorption, they are frequently recommended as companion remedies to other natural medicines, such as Feelgood Health BioVent, Immunity Plus or KiddieBoost.

      Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Triple Complex Brain Tonic - Tissue salts for better brain health & balance
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 121.50

Triple Complex Brain Tonic combines bio-chemic tissue salts chosen to support brain health. It can benefit all people, especially children with learning disabilities or ADHD, as well as teens and adults who are in need of a boost in mental clarity while undergoing stress like exams or challenging work pressures.

  • Natural brain tonic for students of all ages
  • Helps the brain cope during times of stress
  • Improves nutrition & oxygen flow to the brain
  • Assists with concentration & memory (reduces forgetfulness)
  • Helps in the natural treatment of ADHD, ADD & learning disorders
  • Safe for all ages and during pregnancy

Ingredients

Triple Complex Brain Tonic contains the following selected biochemic tissue salts:

Kali phos (D6), Nat mur (D6), Calc phos (D6), Lactose (inactive ingredient)

    Directions

    Triple Complex Brain Tonic can be used as a daily supplement in its own right, or as an adjunct to enhance the benefits of natural medicines for various conditions. It comes in small sucking tablets which are placed under the tongue to dissolve.

    Dosage:
    6 years and older: As a regular supplement, dissolve 2 tablets under the tongue or chew in the mouth three times daily. During times of stress, the frequency of dosage can be increased to five or six times daily.

    Age 1 - 6 years: One tablet three times daily (may be crushed into a powder and sprinkled in the mouth)  

    Note: Because tissue salts improve cellular functioning and assist with absorption, they are frequently recommended as companion remedies to other natural medicines.

      Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Silicea Tissue Salt No.12 - Healthy Skin, Hair & Nails (60 tablets)
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 61.50

AllisOne's Silicea (60 tablets) strengthens, cleanses and conditions the connective tissues and helps to maintain healthy skin, hair and nails.

  • Deters premature ageing and improves the appearance of wrinkles
  • Cleanses the skin of boils, abscesses, styes and pimples, reduces scar tissue and keloids
  • Promotes well-being, tranquility and is helpful in stress-management
  • Improves involuntary twitching of eyes or muscles
  • Calms aggression, irritability and over-sensitivity to noise or light
  • Assists the body to remove foreign material that the body naturally would seek to eliminate*
  • Helps to calm whinging children
  • Lactose and sugar free (suitable for Vegans, Diabetics, children and animals)

*We advise caution in extended usage of Silicea in situations where medication is prescribed to prevent the rejection of transplanted organs or artificial implants. In these cases, it is better to substitute with Bioplasma.

Ingredients

Silicea D6.

Directions for use

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively, as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

  • Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
  • Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or a bottle) 
  • Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside
entry.s:tag: AllisOne Wholesale Distrubutor in South Africa

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively, as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.
